history.proof: intros pl. induction pl using prec_list_ind. - unfold pl_card. sfirstorder depth: 3. - simpl. auto.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply le_trans with (n := pl_card pl1 + S (pl_card pl0)).
exceptions.exn: The reference pl1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros pl. induction pl using prec_list_ind. - unfold pl_card. auto. - simpl. apply le_trans with (n := pl_card pl1 + S (pl_card pl0)). auto. ring.
